post:
<center><b>NVMe SSD and HDD cpanel Hosting</b></center>

Our NVMe SSD cpanel shared hosting ensures the fastest page load times for your sites.
Located in Germany with unlimited DDoS protection and nginx web server.
Our HDD cpanel reseller hosting offers increased storage capacity for resellers while still offering great performance.
Located in London with unlimited DDoS protection and apache webserver.

**Softaculous**
Included with all cpanel plans, softaculous allows our clients to deploy a number of scripts such as Joomla and wordpress with a single click.

**JetBackUp**
We offer local and offsite backup with Jetbackup. We also allow our clients to specify their own offsite backup locations that they would like their backups to be taken to.
Local backups are taken daily. Offsite backups are taken 3 times weekly incrementally.

**CloudFlare RailGun**
We have been a proud Cloudflare partner for over a year and have always included CF railgun with all of our shared and reseller hosting packages.
Railgun comes free (usually $200/m) with any of our plans allowing you to cache the uncacheable to further boost your site speeds.

**CloudLinux**
Both our shared servers utilize cloudlinux ensuring greater security for shared hosting clients. 
Our LV limits can be found [here](https://hostdoc.co.uk/limits)

**Assisted Migration**
**AutoSSL**
**SSH Terminal Access**
**24/7 Support**
**Instant Activation**
**30 Day Money Back Guarantee**

**Uptime stats**
We are proud to offer a 99.7% uptime guarantee.
We are even prouder to currently have 99.9% uptime for both our [shared](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk/780596370) and [reseller](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk/780735560) servers.
